pkgmetadata.longdescription: 64-Bit Extension of the SPArse Matrix R Package 'spam' // Provides the Fortran code of the R package 'spam' with 64-bit integers. Loading this package together with the R package spam enables the sparse matrix class spam to handle huge sparse matrices with more than 2^31-1 non-zero elements. Documentation is provided in Gerber, Moesinger and Furrer (2017) doi:10.1016/j.cageo.2016.11.015.
